plays.text: Penalty to Radim Vrbata 2 minutes for Hooking Zach Parise
Goal scored by Brian Gionta assisted by Scott Gomez AND Jamie Langenbrunner
Goal scored by Tyler Arnason assisted by Kyle Calder AND Jassen Cullimore
Penalty to Jim Vandermeer 2 minutes for Tripping Patrik Elias
Goal scored by Radim Vrbata assisted by Tyler Arnason AND Kyle Calder
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Martin Lapointe
Goal scored by Colin White assisted by Sergei Brylin AND Grant Marshall
Penalty to Cam Janssen 2 minutes for Charging Adam Munro
Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Tripping Scott Gomez
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Zach Parise shootout attempt against Adam Munro with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
Pavel Vorobiev shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Wide of Net results in a MISS!
Patrik Elias shootout attempt against Adam Munro with a Backhand results in a GOAL!
Radim Vrbata shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Wide of Net results in a MISS!
Brian Gionta shootout attempt against Adam Munro with a Over Net results in a MISS!
Mikael Holmqvist shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Wristshot results in a GOAL!
Tyler Arnason shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
Viktor Kozlov shootout attempt against Adam Munro with a Wristshot results in a GOAL!
